page.title: 06The New Sports Hall
page.content: The Sports Hall was finished in February, 1985 and has been open since then. It was officially opened by the former English cricket captain, Bob Willis, on 25th of June. We waited in the main hall at Lacon Childe for him. The chairman of the management committee, Mr. Heath introduced Bob Willis and everybody cheered and clapped. In his talk he made an appeal to us to use the Sports Hall fully. Then he pulled the string and the curtain opened to show the plaque. He later looked at the facilities with us. There is tennis, badminton, bowls, football, netball, basketball, volley ball, cricket, table tennis, weight lifting, gymnastics and an exercise bike. On the cricket pitch everybody cheered when Bob bowled an over. People then took photos, got his autograph and shook hands with him.
